title: Achieve SAP-015 L3 Production Maturity
description:
Work toward L3 maturity for SAP-015 (task-tracking with beads).

L3 Success Criteria (from capability-charter.md):
- Multi-adopter: 5+ projects using beads
- ROI metrics: Time savings ‚â•20% on context re-establishment
- Multi-agent coordination: 2+ agents using shared task db
- Advanced dependency tracking: Complex task graphs
- Automation: Integration with SAP-010 (A-MEM), SAP-001 (inbox)

Current Status: L1 Pilot (1 repo, dogfooding phase)
Target: L3 Production by Q2 2026

Trace: sap-015-l3-roadmap

title: Phase 2: Build ROI instrumentation scripts
description:
Create tracking scripts for SAP-015 L3 ROI metrics.

Scripts needed:
1. sap015-setup-tracker.py - Track setup time (target: ‚â§30 min)
2. sap015-context-tracker.py - Track context re-establishment time (target: 20% savings)
3. sap015-task-tracker.py - Track task completion velocity
4. sap015-dependency-tracker.py - Track blocked work resolution time
5. sap015-metrics.py - Comprehensive ROI dashboard

Similar to SAP-010 and SAP-028 instrumentation.

Trace: sap-015-phase2-roi

title: Explore new capability opportunities
description: Review SAP gaps using sap-evaluator.py, consider improvements to SAP-009 (agent-awareness) based on lessons learned, evaluate opportunities for new SAPs. Trace: sap-exploration-2025-11

comments.author: victorpiper
comments.text:
Exploration Complete - Opportunities Identified:

**1. Production Data Collection (High Priority)**
- SAP-010 (Memory System): 2/5 L3 criteria met, needs 2-3 months data
- SAP-015 (Task Tracking): 4/5 L3 criteria met, needs 2-3 months data
- Recommendation: Continue dogfooding both SAPs actively

**2. SAP Maturity Gaps (sap-evaluator findings)**
- 29 SAPs installed, avg level: 1.00 (basic adoption)
- 0 SAPs at L2 (Advanced) or L3 (Production)
- Priority gaps: Test coverage (SAP-004: 0% < 85%), YAML frontmatter missing in AGENTS.md files
- Opportunity: Deepen adoption of existing SAPs vs creating new ones

**3. SAP-009 (Agent Awareness) Improvements**
- Learned from SAP-010/015 L3 work: better ROI tracking patterns
- Could add A-MEM + beads integration examples
- Progressive context loading patterns working well (could document more)

**4. Documentation Quality**
- Missing YAML frontmatter in many AGENTS.md files (SAP-001, SAP-002, SAP-004+)
- Could improve consistency across SAP awareness files
- Link validation infrastructure exists (SAP-016) but needs active use

**5. New SAP Opportunities** (if needed)
- None critical - focus on deepening existing SAPs first
- SAP-029 (SAP Generation) could be formalized (Plan A from earlier)
- But dogfooding existing infrastructure is higher ROI

**Recommendation Ranking**:
1. üî• Dogfood SAP-015 + SAP-010 for 2-3 months (production data)
2. üéØ Fix YAML frontmatter gaps (quick wins, improves consistency)
3. üìä Add test coverage to close SAP-004 gap
4. üìö Document lessons learned from L3 work (improve SAP-009)
5. üÜï Consider new SAPs only after existing ones reach L2/L3

title: Complete SAP-010 v1.0.3 + SAP-028 v1.1.0 L3 work
description:
Completed 2025-11-05: L3 maturity work for SAP-010 and SAP-028.

SAP-010 (Memory System) v1.0.3:
- Phase 1: Multi-adopter expansion (chora-compose)
- Phase 2: ROI instrumentation (4 tracking scripts)
- Phase 3: Automation (3 scripts: index, compress, metrics)
- Phase 4: Knowledge base growth (3 notes)
- Phase 5: Ledger updated
- Status: Pilot (2/5 L3 criteria met)

SAP-028 (Publishing Automation) v1.1.0:
- Phase 1: Multi-adopter expansion (5 projects total)
- Phase 2: ROI instrumentation (3 tracking scripts)
- Phase 3: CI validation (sap028-validate.py)
- Phase 4: Ledger updated to Production
- Status: Production (5/5 L3 criteria met) ‚úÖ

Total work:
- 3 demo packages created (pypi-demo-alpha/beta/gamma)
- 12 scripts created (7 for SAP-010, 5 for SAP-028)
- 2 ledgers updated
- Multiple A-MEM events logged

Trace: sap-010-028-l3-work

title: Review SAP-010 L3 progress and plan next steps
description: SAP-010 currently at Pilot (2/5 L3 criteria met). Review what's needed for L3 Production: production data collection, metrics validation, integration testing. Trace: sap-010-l3-continuation

comments.author: victorpiper
comments.text:
SAP-010 L3 Review Complete:

**Current Status**: Pilot (2/5 L3 criteria met)

**L3 Criteria Progress**:
‚úÖ Multi-adopter: 2 projects (chora-base + chora-compose)
‚úÖ Context restoration: 97.2% time saved (target: ‚â•80%)
‚è≥ Knowledge queries: 1.0 avg (target: ‚â•3) - need daily usage data
‚è≥ Note reuse: 0% (target: ‚â•50%) - need reuse tracking
‚è≥ Mistake reduction: 0% (target: ‚â•30%) - need 30-60 days baseline

**Infrastructure Complete**:
- 7 ROI tracking scripts built
- Multi-adopter expansion validated
- Knowledge base started (3 notes, 10 tags, 1 link)
- Auto-indexing, compression, metrics dashboard operational

**Next Steps for L3 Production**:
1. Collect 2-3 months production data
2. Track knowledge queries actively (scripts ready)
3. Track note reuse patterns (scripts ready)
4. Establish 30-60 day mistake baseline (scripts ready)
5. Promote to L3 Production when 5/5 criteria met

**Recommendation**: Continue dogfooding A-MEM alongside SAP-015 (beads). Both SAPs need production data collection.

title: Phase 3: Validate A-MEM integration in practice
description:
Actually use beads + A-MEM integration documented in protocol-spec.md.

Actions:
1. Log A-MEM events with beads_task_id fields
2. Create beads tasks with trace_id fields
3. Demonstrate traceability: A-MEM events ‚Üí beads tasks
4. Update A-MEM scripts to support beads correlation
5. Create example showing 'what was done' (A-MEM) ‚Üí 'what to do' (beads)

This validates the theoretical integration we documented but never tested.

Trace: sap-015-phase3-amem

title: 90-day production data collection (SAP-015 + SAP-010)
description: Collect production data for L3 validation over 90 days (Nov 2025 - Jan 2026). Daily: log context time, query knowledge, track tasks. Weekly: create knowledge notes, review velocity. Monthly: run L3 dashboard. GO/NO-GO decision: Week 12. Target: SAP-015 & SAP-010 promoted to L3 Production by Feb 2026. Trace: 90-day-l3-production

title: Phase 4: Multi-agent coordination validation
description:
Validate multi-agent task coordination using beads.

Actions:
1. Use beads in 2+ different environments (Claude Code + Claude Desktop, or different machines)
2. Test git-based task synchronization
3. Validate hash-based ID collision prevention
4. Test dependency resolution across agents
5. Document multi-agent workflows

This proves beads works for team collaboration, not just single-agent.

Trace: sap-015-phase4-multiagent
